```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)

item <- read_csv("olist_order_items_dataset.csv")
market <- read_csv("olist_products_dataset.csv")

inner_join(item, market, by = c("product_id" = "product_id")) %>% group_by(product_category_name) %>%
  summarise(count = sum(n())) %>% arrange(-count)

```
